Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera! All of the features work great. Amazing zoom power, you can get such a clean image from a distance. The red eye correction actually corrects red eye! Even when cropping an image, you still turn out a crisp picture when cropping in really close. You cannot find a better camera for the price of this one!

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT FOR HUBBIE!!!
Reviews.Author: Kay R. Johnston
Reviews.Content: Bought as birthday gift for husband--he liked both the camera, and all the accessories a lot!  Said the quality of photos was excellent (better than my camera).

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: rkahn
Reviews.Content: This camera is decent.  It takes very good pictures.  I bought it because of all the accessories it came with.However, the Fuji 4500 S is a better buy. It costs the same without the accessories but takes much bettervideos. Foolish me.  Don't repeat my mistake. Either get the Fuji or pay a bit more and buy a Canon SX500or Canon SX280.  There's your answer.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Dolores Ford
Reviews.Content: We received the camera in plenty of time to try it out and get used to it before we went on vacation.We are pleased with the pictures and ability of zoom.  We were able to get some great pictures of the scenery in Alaska and the wild animals we saw.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, average bundle
Reviews.Author: Ste
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  Lots of adjustable options in a sub-$200 point and shoot, along with a very good auto picture option.  The bundle however was not what I expected.  I received all items as listed in the product page, but the camera case is way too small for the SX160.  I will have to provide my own.

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: K. Turpin
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, just what I expected. I do wish it had a view finder. I like the extra zoom.

Reviews.Title: Tiny camera case
Reviews.Author: Greg Burr
Reviews.Content: The camera case that comes in the accessary kit is a joke. The only way that it could ever fit over the camera is for a stretching machine to do the job for you. I tried for several minutes and it was useless.  One should be able to slide a camera into its case. If it takes several minutes then get another case.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great, accessories not so great
Reviews.Author: Fernando Soubeste
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the camera, but the accessories sent did not meet the expectations, por example the bag is not big enough to put the camera in it and totally different than the one in the picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great value
Reviews.Author: D. Francis
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my SX160. Canon cameras are tops in my opinion and the bundle makes this a great value.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Zakiyyah Shakir
Reviews.Content: For the price of this camera it is one of my favorite compact digital cameras, the pics are crisp and clear, and the hd video is amazing.

Reviews.Title: My Christmas present
Reviews.Author: ACAStroud
Reviews.Content: I received this for Christmas and love all the extras that came with it plus the camera takes great pics! The only thing I didn't like was that it uses regular batteries or rechargeable ones but not the kind of camera that you just plug in to the wall to charge. The zoom and features are great and I highly recommend this camera!

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 7 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)
8 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Denali Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - 25 FREE Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) + 6pc Bunlde 8GB Accessory Kit
